contest-event.event-date: Sept. 28, 1907 D National Championship of Great Britain (Crystal Palace) National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) 1 Test Piece Contest National Championship of Great Britain (Finals) national-finals-championship-section European Championships The current Nationals contest began in 1900, but there was a previous 'Nationals' contest run 40 years earlier: Enderby Jackson's Great National Contest. Championship Gems of Schumann Crystal Palace (Concert Hall), Crystal Palace Park, Sydenham, County of London, England, UK Prizes: 1st: 40 Pounds plus 1000 Guinea Trophy (Total prize valued at 1,140) 2nd: 30 Pounds plus Daily Telegraph cup 3rd: 20 Pounds plus instrument valued at 20 4th: 16 Pounds plus imperial supreme class trombone 5th: 12 Pounds plus class A cornet 6th: 10 Pounds plus music prize valued at 12.12s 7th: 5 Pounds plus courtois cornet Oct. 21, 2010, 10:34 p.m. Aug. 28, 2013, 1:39 p.m. 1 Wingates Band William Rimmer 2 BMP (Europe) Goodshaw Band William Halliwell 3 Halifax King Cross Walter Halstead 4 Rushden Windmill Band John Gladney Jnr 5 Perfection Soap Works William Halliwell 6 Gossage Soap Works William Rimmer 7 Shaw Band William Rimmer 8 Felling Band William Heap 9 Palmer's Works J.
